articles.title: NASA may have just cracked the code for replacing lithium in batteries: ‘Double or even triple the energy’ - Yahoo News
articles.description: While lithium-ion batteries are currently standard, NASA is using a 'solid-state battery' that is lighter and can store more power.
articles.content:
NASA believes it has cracked the code in the quest to make electric planes a more viable technology.

articles.title: Lamborghini won’t expand LMDh plan beyond Iron Lynx in WEC and IMSA - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Lamborghini has ruled out expanding its LMDh programme in the World Endurance Championship and IMSA SportsCar Championship beyond the Iron Lynx team.
